revised_title: Effect of Cross Wind on Rifled Projectiles: Analyzing the Influence of Wind on Projectile Motion
tldr: This article investigates the impact of cross-winds on the trajectory of rifled projectiles, demonstrating that accurate experiments on this subject can provide valuable information about the flight of projectiles in still air. The author also discusses the relationship between the angle of the projectile's axis and the direction of its motion, and the role of air resistance in affecting this angle.
